movies.title: A New Hope
movies.description: The first film in the Star Wars series where a young Luke Skywalker embarks on a journey to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Galactic Empire.

movies.title: The Empire Strikes Back
movies.description: The second film in the original trilogy where the Rebels are pursued by Darth Vader and the Empire.

movies.title: Return of the Jedi
movies.description: The conclusion of the original trilogy where the Rebels unite for a final battle against the Empire.

comics.title: STAR WARS (2015) #1
comics.description: The destruction of the Death Star marks a triumph for the Rebel Alliance. However, the struggle against the Empire continues.

comics.title: STAR WARS (2015) #2
comics.description: The Rebel assault on Cymoon 1 continues as Luke faces Darth Vader and Han, Leia, and the others find themselves trapped.

news.title: Star Wars Vision Returns with Volume 3 in 2025
news.description: The third installment of the popular animated anthology series is set to return.

news.title: New Star Wars Celebration Japan 2025 Badge Art - Updated
news.description: Check out the updated badge art for the upcoming Star Wars Celebration in Japan.

shopItems.name: Coffee Table
shopItems.description: A stylish coffee table made from durable wood.

shopItems.name: Vader's Watch
shopItems.description: Vader's Watch - a timepiece for the dark side.

characters.name: Anakin Skywalker
characters.description: Discovered as a slave on Tatooine, Anakin was believed to be the Chosen One destined to bring balance to the Force.

characters.name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
characters.description: A noble Jedi Master who fought alongside Anakin Skywalker.

characters.name: Luke Skywalker
characters.description: The hero of the Rebellion and a skilled Jedi Knight, Luke seeks to save the galaxy from the Empire.
